Author: broketreebranch
Text: I've been to treatment many times and everyone feels like they're the "biggest one there." Really people of all sizes and all ages are there so it's very unlikely you're going to stand out in any way.

Author: scarletfawn
Text: I understand your feelings... In reality though there isn't really a weight or size for an ED, if you need treatment it doesn't matter how you look, it's the thoughts that make you sick. Someone who looks thinner might be in a better place mentally than someone of a normal BMI. I wish you strength on your recovery ðŸ’›
